text: The Bouvier des Flandres is a breed of dog that originated in Flanders. They are now known to be guard dogs, police dogs and pets. They were originally known for cattle droving, sheep herding, and cart pulling. Their name means "Cow Herder of Flanders" in English. Category:Dog breeds originating in Belgium Category:Rare dog breeds Category:FCI breeds Category:Flanders
title: Bouvier des Flandres
